subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Veteran receiver Amani Toomer, who is tied for the team lead in receptions and is second in receiving yards, will miss the rest of the season because of a knee injury, the Giants announced Wednesday.
snippet: Veteran receiver Amani Toomer, who is tied for the team lead in receptions and is second in receiving yards, will miss the rest of the season because of a knee injury, the Giants announced Wednesday.
